subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Cleveland Cavaliers acquired Shaquille O’Neal, and the Orlando Magic traded for Vince Carter, shaking up the N.B.A.’s landscape.
snippet: The Cleveland Cavaliers acquired Shaquille O’Neal, and the Orlando Magic traded for Vince Carter, shaking up the N.B.A.’s landscape.
